All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionFactory
Generates possible Legal Game States from a inital game state
COSC322Test
An example illustrating how to implement a GamePlayer
DepthFirstSearch
DepthFirst Search Recursive algorithm using tree search method this is used in our A* and was the foundation of many other components
GameBoardState
GameState class which holds a local game state represented as a 2d matrix.
GameLossException
 
GameWinException
 
mctsUpgraded
Monte Carlo Algorithm, which simulates entire games until a timer is up and returns a UCB value as a heuristic
MiniMaxSearch
MiniMax search Algorithm with alpha beta pruning, using a iterative depth first search.
MonteTree
Deprecated.
Was not finished
MonteTreeSerailizer
Used to hold Heuristic constants which determine how much weight is applied to each.
MoveInfo
A helper class that contains Move information of a past and current play made to a game state in a format for GameBoardState and Node.
MoveSequence
How We calculate a move based on the different methods implemented
Node
Node Representation for the game tree
Nueron
Neuron class holds weights which are applied to heuristic functions.
PrintStats
Prints saved weights from a file in data
SimBiulder
SimBiulder is a class that simulates games of Amazons using A*.
